scala> val bitly = as("bitlyapidemo", "R_0da49e0a9118ff35f52f629d2d71bf07")

scala> bitly.call(clicks("http://bit.ly/H4HnM"))

scala> res0.getTotalClicks
res1: Long = 198
}}}
